experience.title: Database and Android Developer
experience.description: â€¢ Collaborated with the development team to design a scalable database schema supporting user profiles, appointment scheduling, and medical history tracking for an Android doctor booking app.â€¢ Optimised database structure with indexing and normalisation to ensure high performance and low latency for real-time booking and appointment management.â€¢ Integrated security measures and data encryption in the schema, ensuring compliance and protecting user privacy for sensitive patient information.
